availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Administrative body of the state of Georgia. Capital at Milledgeville from 1804 to 1868. Capital at Atlanta from 1868.

ab.bibl: James C. Cobb and John C. Inscoe, New Georgia Encyclopedia, "Georgia History Overview," (Georgia Humanities and the University of Georgia Press, September 25, 2009), https://www.georgiaencyclopedia.org/articles/history-archaeology/georgia-history-overview#:~:text=Established%20in%201732%2C%20with%20settlement,Carolina's%20founding%20(in%201663).
